title: The Problem with Popplers
desc: The crew discovers an irresistible source of food on a distant planet, and brings it back to Earth to be sold at the Fishy Joe's restaurant chain. But when it's discovered that the so-called Popplers are actually Omicronian babies. This causes the angry Omicronian race to invade earth in retaliation for their children being eaten the Omicronians demand recompense by having permission to eat Leela, who unfortunatley started the Poppler chain.
